AFAnalysisCategory.Name: DrillingModes
AFAnalysisCategory.Description: Mode of rig duirng the drilling of a well

AFEnumerationSet.Name: Well States
AFEnumerationSet.Description: Different states of Drilling and Completion

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: API Well Number
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Well ID - "unique, permanent, numeric identifier" assigned to each well drilled for oil and gas in the United States. Owned by PPDM Association.

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Bit Weight
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Weight on Bit (WOB) - downward force exerted on the drill bit

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Differential Pressure
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Difference between the hydrostatic pressure exerted on the bottom of the hole and the formation pressure. High dp (>2000) can cause differential sticking.

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Drill string volume
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Volume based on current pipe length\measured depth

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Flow In Rate
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Rate of drilling fluid into well bore.

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Hook Load
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Total force pulling down on the hook.

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Measured Depth
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: MD - total length along bore path from ground to end of wellbore

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Mud Weight In
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Density of mud or drilling fluid sampled as going into well

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Pump Pressure
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: System pressure loss - the sum total of all the pressure losses from the oil well surface equipment, and all drill & pipe components.

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Top Drive RPM
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: RPM of the motor assembly for torquing the drill string

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Total Vertical Depth
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: TVD - absolute vertical distance from ground end of wellbore

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Well State
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: State of well being drilled by the rig

AFAnalysisTemplate.Name: Rotary Drilling
AFAnalysisTemplate.Description: Trigger could be ROP instead of calculated DepthChange

AFAnalysisTemplate.Name: Sliding
AFAnalysisTemplate.Description: Trigger could be ROP instead of calculated DepthChange

AFAnalysisTemplate.Name: Stick-Slip
AFAnalysisTemplate.Description: Trigger could be ROP instead of calculated DepthChange

AFAnalysis.Name: Rotary Drilling
AFAnalysis.Description: ALES I REMOVED ROP - NOT NEEDED??. Trigger could be ROP instead of calculated DepthChange

AFAnalysis.Name: Stick-Slip
AFAnalysis.Description: ALES WHAT DOES FLOW IN RATE HAVE TO DO WITH
